title: White Small Square

adjectives: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

description: A medium-small-sized square shaded completely white. Smaller than the White Large Square, White Medium Square, and the White Medium-Small Square.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the white small square emoji is rendered with impeccable crispness and a subtle, almost imperceptible sheen. Its perfectly geometric form, defined by soft, rounded edges characteristic of Apple's design language, makes it a clean and versatile element. This emoji is frequently used to represent selection, order, or as a minimalist visual marker in digital communication, feeling both deliberate and modern on your Apple screen.
